roleset.name: supervise
roleset.note: OVERSEE-V NOTES: "Oversee" is a portmanteau for "supervise"; "over" = "super" and "see"= "vise" (eg, "vision" etc). (from oversee.01-v)
OVERSIGHT-N NOTES: Based on sentences in nouns-00040. Comparison to oversight.01-v. No VN or FN classes. Framed by Katie. (from oversight.01-n)
OVERSIGHT-V NOTES: Frame created by Arrick (from oversight.01-v)

example.name: oversee-v: they all look like this
example.text: Mr. Horton, who *trace* oversaw Gulf Power's governmental-affairs efforts, died mysteriously in a plane crash...

example.name: oversight-n: Congressional supervision of intelligence activities
example.text: any congressional oversight of intelligence activities

example.name: oversight-v: oversee
example.text: The job is one of *PRO* oversighting accountability.

roleset.name: to make an error or a mistake
roleset.note: OVERSIGHT-N NOTES: Based on sentences in nouns-00040. Comparison to err.01-v. No VN or FN classes. Framed by Katie. (from oversight.02-n)

example.name: oversight-n: arg 0
example.text: Whether Mr. McInnes 's oversight is merely a sign of a mainlander 's benign neglect

example.name: oversight-n: both args
example.text: CL& P's oversight of the error
